page.title: 10Activities again.
page.content: Swimming club is run every Thursday, at Stokesley Baths. There is a little pool for non-swimmers and a big pool for the others. Children learn the skills of life saving and work for different badges. Recorders out of school is run by Mrs.Watts. She mostly teaches the descant recorder and uses school recorder books one and two. Football club is held on Wednesday nights with Mr.Huddleston and on Saturday mornings with the parents, again like swimming they work for badges. Young Ornithology Club is part of the R.S.P.B. It is run by Mrs.Bainbridge one night a week. Sometimes we record data from the wild garden, but mostly we learn more about birds from slides, tapes and books.
